mapper.select: select * from freereply where frbno=#{frbno} and frdel=false order by frrno
mapper.insert: insert into freereply ( frbno, frnickname, frcontents ) values (#{frbno}, #{frnickname}, #{frcontents})
mapper.update: update freereply set frdel=true where frrno=#{frrno}
update freereply set set frcontents=#{frcontents}, fregdate=current_timestamp where frrno=#{frrno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from freereply, freeboard where frbno=#{frbno} and frdel=false
